hint: Convert comma-separated implicit joins to explicit LEFT JOIN syntax while pushing filters down to tables early in the plan to reduce row counts before joins.
Pre-filter the highly selective date_dim range and item/warehouse dimensions into CTEs, then join with explicit JOIN ordering to minimize intermediate results.
Materialize all pre-filtered dimension and fact tables into separate CTEs, then restructure the left join using a decomposed approach to avoid redundant catalog_sales scans.
Transform the left outer join to an EXISTS correlated subquery or a UNION ALL pattern to eliminate null-producing joins, and apply pre-filtering in the subqueries for early aggregation.
